items.headline: Broadcom’s stock is soaring on a new OpenAI deal. Here’s what to know.
items.summary_en: OpenAI, which recently inked arrangements with Nvidia and AMD, is now turning to Broadcom’s custom chips as it continues its quest for computing power.

items.headline: These stocks are surging as JPMorgan follows Trump’s lead with investments in ‘critical’ industries
items.summary_en: JPMorgan launches $1.5 trillion initiative to boost industries deemed vital for national security, after the Trump administration took stakes in rare-earth, lithium and chip companies.

items.headline: Deal mania is back on Wall Street. Here’s what it means for JPMorgan — and for banking-sector earnings.
items.summary_en: A rise in M&A and IPO activity during the quarter takes center stage as JPMorgan leads a parade of bank earnings on Tuesday, followed by Bank of America and Morgan Stanley on Wednesday.
